## Company Overview

**Name:** Fixco
**Type:** Home Services Company (Hantverksföretag)
**Founded:** 2020
**Country:** Sweden (Sverige)
**Primary Language:** Swedish (sv-SE)
**Website:** https://fixco.se

## Contact Information

- **Phone:** +46 79 335 02 28
- **Email:** info@fixco.se
- **Address:** Kungsgatan 1, 753 18 Uppsala, Sverige

## Opening Hours

- Monday-Friday: 07:00-18:00
- Saturday: 09:00-15:00
- Sunday: Closed

---

## ⚠️ Important Pricing Notice

**Electrical and plumbing work requires a quote.** Prices vary depending on project scope.
Contact us: +46 79 335 02 28

---

## Services Overview

Fixco provides professional construction, renovation, and home services in Uppsala and Stockholm, Sweden. All services include ROT or RUT tax deductions where applicable.

### Services with Fixed Hourly Rates

| Service | Swedish Name | Price/Hour | After Deduction | Tax Deduction |
|---------|--------------|------------|-----------------|---------------|
| Carpenter | Snickare | 958 kr/h | 479 kr/h | ROT (50%) |
| Painting | Målning | 958 kr/h | 479 kr/h | ROT (50%) |
| Flooring | Golv | 958 kr/h | 479 kr/h | ROT (50%) |
| Moving | Flytt & Packning | 559 kr/h | 280 kr/h | RUT (50%) |

### Services Requiring Quote

| Service | Swedish Name | Pricing | Tax Deduction |
|---------|--------------|---------|---------------|
| Electrician | Elmontör | ⚠️ Quote required | ROT (50%) |
| Plumber | VVS/Rörmokare | ⚠️ Quote required | ROT (50%) |
| Groundwork | Markarbeten | Quote required | ROT (50%) |

---

## Swedish Tax Deductions (ROT & RUT)

### ROT-avdrag (Renovation Tax Deduction)
- **Discount:** 50% on labor costs
- **Max per year:** 50,000 SEK
- **Applies to:** Electrical, plumbing, carpentry, painting, flooring, groundwork
- **Requirement:** Property must be 5+ years old

### RUT-avdrag (Household Services Tax Deduction)
- **Discount:** 50% on labor costs
- **Max per year:** 75,000 SEK
- **Applies to:** Cleaning, gardening, moving, furniture assembly
- **Requirement:** No age limit on property

---

## Service Areas

### Uppsala County (Uppsala län)
Uppsala, Knivsta, Enköping, Bålsta, Storvreta, Märsta, Sigtuna, Vallentuna

### Stockholm County (Stockholms län)
Stockholm, Solna, Sundbyberg, Nacka, Lidingö, Täby, Danderyd, Sollentuna, Huddinge, Botkyrka, Haninge, Tyresö

### Stockholm Districts
Östermalm, Södermalm, Kungsholmen, Vasastan, Bromma, Hägersten

---

## Why Choose Fixco?

1. ✅ 50% discount via ROT/RUT tax deduction
2. ✅ Free home visit for quotes
3. ✅ Quote within 24-48 hours
4. ✅ All workers have F-tax certificate and insurance
5. ✅ Fixed price or hourly rate - you choose
6. ✅ Quality guarantee on all work

## Credentials

- **F-skattsedel:** Yes (registered for tax)
- **Insurance:** Full liability insurance
- **Elsäkerhetsverket:** Authorized (electrical work)
- **Säker Vatten:** Certified (plumbing work)

---

## How to Book

1. Describe your project at fixco.se or call +46 79 335 02 28
2. Receive a free quote within 24-48 hours
3. Book an appointment
4. Work is performed by certified professionals
5. Pay invoice with ROT/RUT deduction already applied
